Package jcolibri.extensions.textual.method

Textual CBR Methods.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BasicIEMethod Extracts texts information and stores it in case individuals (if defined).
CasesIRMethod Decomposition method assigned to "Cases IR tasks".
DomainTopicClassifierMethod Associates a Topic using extracted Features and Phrases as conditions.
ExtractFeaturesMethod Extracts features using Regular Expressions.
ExtractNamesMethod Selects the main names of the text.
ExtractPhrasesMethod Extracts Phrases using Regular Expressions.
GlossaryRelationsMethod Relates query words to cases words using a domain specific glossary.
KeywordLayerMethod Decomposition method assigned to "Keyword Layer".
PartofSpeechMethod This method uses a Maximum Entropy tagger (Opennlp) to assign Part-of-Speech tags.
RetrieveTextualCasesMethod Decomposition method assigned to "Retrieve Task".
SetupTextualCasesMethod Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
SkipThisTaskMethod Empty method that can be used when user doesn't want to include a layer.
StemmerMethod This method can perform several stemmer algorithms for diferent languages.
TextRelationsMethod Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
TextualCBRPreProcessMethod Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
TextualCBRRetrieveMethod Decomposition method assigned to "Retrieve Task".
TextualPreCycleMethod Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
WordNetRelationsMethod Relates query words to cases words using WordNet.
WordsFilterMethod Filters the text removing stop-words and special characters.
 

Package jcolibri.extensions.textual.method Description

Textual CBR Methods.

This package stores several standard TCBR Methods. It includes:

  • Words filters
  • Part-of-Speech tagging
  • Stemmer algorithms
  • Name Extraction
  • Phrase identification
  • Glossary
  • Thesaurus (WordNet)
  • Feature Extraction
  • Topics classification
  • Basic Information Extraction

These methods uses several external packages:

  • Open Natural Language Processor - Grok: This package uses the Maximum Entropy model to perform natural language algorithms.

    Information about opennlp MaxEnt model is avaliable in: http://maxent.sourceforge.net

    OpenNLP is available in: http://opennlp.sourceforge.net.

    Really, Opennlp only defines a set of Java interfaces and implements some basic infrastructure for NLP components. This is the base of other projects/packages like Grok. Grok implements and extends those interfaces so this is the package used in these methods.

    The main advantage of Opennlp is that can be extended by TCBR developers to create new NLP algorithms and classificators.

  • SnowBall. It is a small string processing language designed for creating algorithms for use in Information Retrieval.

    This package contains stemmers algorithms for English, Russian, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Dutch, Swedich, Norwegian, Dannish and Finnish.

    Snowball is available in: http://snowball.tartarus.org

  • Java WordNet Library. It is a Java API for accessing the WordNet relational dictionary.

    This package is available in: http://sourceforge.net/projects/jwordnet
